terms.definition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to breathe.

terms.definition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I get sick easily.

terms.definition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: My hands are weak.
